author: Simon Difford
description: A well-balanced sour with brandy and orange zestiness shaken with a whole egg. Try it. This combo is tastier than it sounds.
name: Egg Sour
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) and fine strain into chilled glass
